Tool Comparison

Here is a comparison of different approaches:

FeaturefetchmdJina ReaderFirecrawl
Local-firstYesNoNo
FreeYesFreemiumPaid
JS RenderingNo (v1)YesYes

Code Example

Here is how you use fetchmd in a pipeline:

curl -s https://example.com | fetchmd | llm "summarize this"

And a TypeScript example:

const html = await fetch(url).then(r => r.text());
const md = toMarkdown(extractContent(html).content);

This demonstrates the composable nature of the tool and its modular architecture.

Each function is independently testable and can be used in isolation.
